snippet: Analysts regard the election in Uttar Pradesh as a barometer of many key issues shaping Indian politics.
abstract: Upcoming elections in Uttar Pradesh, Indian state that is home to more than 200 million people, offers a window onto the nation's complex political atmosphere; analysts regard the race as a barometer of many key issues, including the changing roles of caste and religion, the impact of public disgust over corruption and the rising public desire to share the fruits of economic growth.
lead_paragraph: Analysts regard the election in Uttar Pradesh as a barometer of many key issues shaping Indian politics.

headline.seo: Uttar Pradesh Election Is Window on Indian Politics
headline.main: Elections in Vast Indian State Are Window on Nation’s Politics
headline.print_headline: Elections in Vast Indian State Are Window on Nation’s Politics
